Package jeroquest.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • jeroquest.logic.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents the state of a game and it is defined as: a set of characters, the board where they move around, the current round and the total number of rounds to play
    Author:
    Programming Methodology Professors

            int numMonsters,
            int rows,
            int columns,
            int totalRounds)
        Create a new game with parameters
        Parameters:
        numHeroes - total number of heroes to create
        numMonsters - total number of monsters to create
        rows - height of the board to create
        columns - width of the board to create
        totalRounds - total number of rounds to play
